SDSS_Spec¶

class Spec_pipeline.SDSS_Spec(name, zspec, fits_file)[source]¶

Bases: Spec_pipeline.Spec_Reader.Spec.Spec

Module that read an SDSS spectrum and returns a spec object.

Parameters
namestring

Object name or ID.

zspecfloat

Spectroscopic redshift.

fits_filestring

Spectrum file name. Has to be a one element list.
